## Components
### Actionsheet_COM
``` js
import { Actionsheet } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否显示, 使用 v-model 绑定变量 |
| <span class="prop-key">show-cancel</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否显示取消菜单 |
| <span class="prop-key">cancel-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | cancel(取消) | 取消菜单文字 |
| <span class="prop-key">menus</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> | {} | 菜单项列表，举例：`{menu1: '删除'}`，如果名字上带有`.noop`表明这是纯文本(HTML)展示，不会触发事件，用于展示描述或者提醒 |
| <span class="prop-key">close-on-clicking-mask</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | 点击遮罩时是否关闭菜单，适用于一些进入页面时需要强制选择的场景。 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu</span> |   (menuKey) | 点击菜单时触发，参数为当前菜单项对象 |
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu-{menuKey}</span> |   (menuKey) | 点击事件的快捷方式, 如果你有一个菜单名字为`delete`, 那么你可以监听 `on-click-menu-delete` |
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-menu-cancel</span> |   &nbsp; | 点击取消菜单时触发 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/actionsheet">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  更新到 vue@2.0，使用 `v-model` 而不是`:show.sync`进行显示属性绑定</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加属性 `close-on-clicking-mask`, 适用于强制选择的场景</span></li></ul>

### Blur_COM
``` js
import { Blur } from 'vux'
```

<p class="tip">当前组件使用`svg`实现模糊效果。如果在手机上渲染过慢，可以尝试直接使用css3的`blur filter`。</p>


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">blur-amount</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 10 | 模糊程度 |
| <span class="prop-key">url</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 图片地址 |
| <span class="prop-key">height</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 200 | 容器高度 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | 容器内容，显示在模糊内容上面 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/blur">进入demo页面</a>

### Calendar_COM
``` js
import { Calendar } from 'vux'
```

```html
  <group>
    <calendar title="title" v-model="value"></calendar>
  </group>
```
<p class="tip">`calendar`只能在`Group`中使用 <br>
 除了`title`和 `value`, 其他`props`和`inline-calendar`完全一致。</p>


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 表单值, v-model 绑定 |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | label文字 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-change</span> |   (value) | 值改变时触发 |

|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">header</span> | 头部位置 |

| <span class="prop-key">footer</span> | 底部位置 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-footer</span> |   &nbsp; | 点击底部时触发 |
| <span class="prop-key">on-click-header</span> |   &nbsp; | 点击头部时触发 |

### Cell_COM
``` js
import { Cell } from 'vux'
```

```html
  <group>
    <cell title="title" value="value"></cell>
  </group>
```
<p class="tip">cell只能在`Group`中使用</p>


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 左边标题文字 |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 右侧文字，复杂的样式布局请使用slot |
| <span class="prop-key">inline-desc</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 标题下面文字，一般为说明文字 |
| <span class="prop-key">is-link</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否为链接，如果是，右侧将会出现指引点击的右箭头 |
| <span class="prop-key">primary</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | title | 可选值为 ['title', 'content']，对应的div会加上weui_cell_primary类名实现内容宽度自适应 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | 右侧内容，相比于value的优点是可以用复杂的样式或者调用组件 |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | [废弃] 同默认slot |
| <span class="prop-key">icon</span> | 标题左侧的图像位置 |
| <span class="prop-key">after-title</span> | 标题右侧位置 |
| <span class="prop-key">child</span> | cell的直接子元素，因此可以添加一个相对于cell绝对定位的元素 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/cell">进入demo页面</a>

``` js
import { Checker } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-component-name">Checker</span>

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default-item-class</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 默认状态class |
| <span class="prop-key">selected-item-class</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 选中样式class |
| <span class="prop-key">disabled-item-class</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 不可选样式class |
| <span class="prop-key">type</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | radio | 类型，单选为`radio`, 多选为`checkbox` |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | 表单值，使用`v-model`绑定 |
| <span class="prop-key">max</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | 最多可选个数，多选时可用 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-change</span> |   `(value)` | value值变化时触发 |


<span class="vux-component-name">CheckerItem</span>

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 当前项的值 |
| <span class="prop-key">disabled</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否为不可选 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-item-click</span> |   `(itemValue, itemDisabled)` | 当前项被点击时触发 |

### Checklist_COM
``` js
import { Checklist } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | 表单值 |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 标题 |
| <span class="prop-key">required</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否为必填 |
| <span class="prop-key">options</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | 选项列表，可以为`[{key:'name',value:'value'}]`的形式 |
| <span class="prop-key">max</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | 最多可选个数 |
| <span class="prop-key">min</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | 最少可选个数 |
| <span class="prop-key">random-order</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否随机打乱选项顺序 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-change</span> |   (value) | 值变化时触发，参数为 (value) |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/checklist">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  默认不显示错误，你可以监听on-error事件结合slot进行处理和显示</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加插槽 footer、after-title</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  如果已经达到max上限，没有选中的选项将不能选择，因此不再和之前版本一样会出现最多可选max个的error信息</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  默认 required 值为false, 与html规范一致</span></li></ul>

| <span class="prop-key">max-year</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | 可选择的最大年份 |
| <span class="prop-key">confirm-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | ok(确认) | 确认按钮文字 |
| <span class="prop-key">cancel-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | cancel(取消) | 取消按钮文字 |
| <span class="prop-key">clear-text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 显示在中间的自定义按钮的文字 |
| <span class="prop-key">year-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | 年份的渲染模板 |
| <span class="prop-key">month-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | 月份的渲染模板 |
| <span class="prop-key">day-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | 日期的渲染模板 |
| <span class="prop-key">hour-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | 小时的渲染模板 |
| <span class="prop-key">minute-row</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | {value} | 分钟的渲染模板 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-change</span> |   `(value)` | 表单值变化时触发, 参数 `(newVal)` |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/datetime">进入demo页面</a>

</p>

### Group_COM
``` js
import { Group } from 'vux'
```

`Group`是一个特殊的表单`wrapper`组件，主要用于将表单分组，单个表单元素也算一组。常见的表单组件都`必须`作为`Group`的子组件。 属于`Group`子组件的有：Cell, XInput, XTextarea, XSwitch, Calendar, XNumber, Radio, XAddress, Datetime, Selector


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 分组标题 |
| <span class="prop-key">titleColor</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 分组标题文字颜色 |
| <span class="prop-key">labelWidth</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 为子元素设定统一label宽度 |
| <span class="prop-key">labelAlign</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 为子元素设定统一对齐方式 |
| <span class="prop-key">labelMarginRight</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 为子元素设定统一的右边margin |
| <span class="prop-key">gutter</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 设定group的上边距，只能用于没有标题时 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Slots</span>

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">default</span> | 子组件插槽 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/group">进入demo页面</a>
<br><br><br>

### InlineCalendar_COM
``` js
import { InlineCalendar } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 当前选中日期，使用`v-model`绑定，默认为空，即选中当天日期 |
| <span class="prop-key">render-month</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | 指定渲染日期，如 [2018, 8] |
| <span class="prop-key">start-date</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 起始日期，格式为'YYYY-MM-dd' |
| <span class="prop-key">end-date</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 结束日期，格式为'YYYY-MM-dd' |
| <span class="prop-key">show-last-month</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | 是否显示上个月的日期 |
| <span class="prop-key">show-next-month</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | 是否显示下个月的日期 |
| <span class="prop-key">highlight-weekend</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否高亮周末 |
| <span class="prop-key">return-six-rows</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | 是否总是渲染6行日期 |
| <span class="prop-key">hide-header</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否隐藏日历头部 |
| <span class="prop-key">hide-week-list</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否隐藏星期列表 |
| <span class="prop-key">replace-text-list</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> |  | 替换列表，可以将默认的日期换成文字，比如今天的日期替换成今，{'TODAY':'今'} |
| <span class="prop-key">weeks-list</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> | ['Su', 'Mo', 'Tu', 'We', 'Th', 'Fr', 'Sa'] | 星期列表，从周日开始 |
| <span class="prop-key">render-function</span> | <span class="type type-function">Function</span> |  | 用于为特定日期添加额外的html内容，参数为(行index,列index,日期详细属性) |
| <span class="prop-key">render-on-value-change</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | 当日期变化时是否重新渲染日历，如果是渲染了多个日历的话需要设为false |
| <span class="prop-key">disable-past</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 禁止选择过去的日期，该选项可以与start-date同时使用 |
| <span class="prop-key">disable-future</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 禁止选择未来的日期，该选项可以end-date同时使用 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/inline-calendar">进入demo页面</a>

### Previewer_COM
``` js
import { Previewer } from 'vux'
```


list的数据示例如图：

``` js
[{
  src: 'https://placekitten.com/800/400',
  w: 600,
  h: 400
},
{
  src: 'https://placekitten.com/1200/900',
  w: 1200,
  h: 900
}]
```

显示特定index的图片，使用`ref`:

``` js
this.$refs.previewer.show(index)
```


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">list</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | 图片列表 |
| <span class="prop-key">options</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> |  | `photoswipe`的设置 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/previewer">进入demo页面</a>

### Scroller_COM
``` js
import { Scroller } from 'vux'
```

<p class="warning">
`Scroller` 希望解决的是简单的列表问题而不是一个内嵌各种复杂标签交互的容器，很容易发生性能或者交互问题。
</p>


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> |  | 对象，上拉或者下拉的状态双向绑定，使用 v-model 绑定，pulldownStatus 及 pullupStatus |
| <span class="prop-key">height</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 容器高度，默认为整个viewport高度 |
| <span class="prop-key">lockX</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 锁定X方向 |
| <span class="prop-key">lockY</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 锁定Y方向 |
| <span class="prop-key">scrollbarX</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否显示横向滚动条 |
| <span class="prop-key">scrollbarY</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否显示垂直方向滚动条 |
| <span class="prop-key">bounce</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | 是否显示边缘回弹效果 |
| <span class="prop-key">use-pulldown</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否使用下拉组件 |
| <span class="prop-key">use-pullup</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否使用上拉组件 |
| <span class="prop-key">pulldown-config</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> | 见下面 | 下拉组件配置 |
| <span class="prop-key">pullup-config</span> | <span class="type type-object">Object</span> | 见下面 | 上拉组件配置 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/scroller">进入demo页面</a>

pulldown 默认配置:

``` js
{
  content: 'Pull Down To Refresh',
  height: 60,
  autoRefresh: false,
  downContent: 'Pull Down To Refresh',
  upContent: 'Release To Refresh',
  loadingContent: 'Loading...',
  clsPrefix: 'xs-plugin-pulldown-'
}
```

pullup 默认配置:

``` js
{
  content: 'Pull Up To Refresh',
  pullUpHeight: 60,
  height: 40,
  autoRefresh: false,
  downContent: 'Release To Refresh',
  upContent: 'Pull Up To Refresh',
  loadingContent: 'Loading...',
  clsPrefix: 'xs-plugin-pullup-'
}
```

<span class="vux-qa">QA 如何更新数据</span>

如果展示内容只是简单的增加或者减少，直接调用`reset`方法即可

``` js
this.$nextTick(() => {
  this.$refs.scroller.reset()
})
```

如果展示内容完全重载，那么需要主动设置位置让其能正确回到顶部。适用于改变筛选条件后重载数据的情况

``` js
this.$nextTick(() => {
  this.$refs.scroller.reset({
    top: 0
  })
})
```

<span class="vux-qa">QA 如何设置pullup完成</span>

方法1，直接调用ref的`donePullup`方法

``` js
this.$refs.demo2.donePullup()
```

方法2，绑定value, 重置状态

<p class="tip">自定义pullup模板同样是用v-model来绑定以获取状态变化</p>

``` html
<scroller v-model="status"></scroller>
```

``` js
data () {
  return {
    status: {
      pullupStatus: 'default'
    }
  }
}
```

```
// 重置状态为default
this.status.pullupStatus = 'default
```

<span class="vux-qa">QA 如何设置pulldown完成</span>

参照`pullup`, 使用方法`donePulldown`或者绑定`pulldownStatus`然后重置为`default`。

<span class="vux-qa">QA 如何禁用或者启用pullup</span>

在有些情况下，比如数据不多不需要上拉加载或者已经加载完成，我们需要禁用pullup
同样可以调用方法 `disablePullup` 或者设置`pullupSatatus`为`disabled`

反之，则调用方法 `enalbePullup` 或者设置`pullupSatatus`为`enabled`

<br><br><br>

<p class="tip">在Chrome模拟器运行时你可能会发现没有效果，这是因为Chrome并不支持原生sticky实现而模拟器环境是iPhone，目前程序是根据Safari版本来判断是否原生支持sticky。因此你可以切换到Android系统进行测试，但是真机上是完全正常的交互。</p>

### Toast_COM
``` js
import { Toast } from 'vux'
```

<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否显示, 使用 v-model 绑定 |
| <span class="prop-key">time</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 2000 | 显示时间 |
| <span class="prop-key">type</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | success | 类型，可选值 success, warn, cancel, text |
| <span class="prop-key">width</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> | 7.6em | 宽度 |
| <span class="prop-key">isShowMask</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否显示遮罩，如果显示，用户将不能点击页面上其他元素 |
| <span class="prop-key">text</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 提示内容，支持 html，和默认slot同样功能 |

| name    | description   |
|-------|-------|

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-show</span> |   &nbsp; | 提示弹出时触发 |
| <span class="prop-key">on-hide</span> |   &nbsp; | 提示隐藏时触发 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/toast">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  使用 `v-model` 而不是`:show.sync`进行显示属性绑定</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  默认不显示遮罩</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加 isShowMask 属性</span></li></ul>

### XAddress_COM
``` js
import { XAddress } from 'vux'
// 如果你需要引入数据
import { XAddress, ChinaAddressData } from 'vux'
// 如果需要引入旧版数据
import { XAddress, ChinaAddressV1Data } from 'vux'
```

```html
  <group>
    <x-address title="title" v-model="value"></x-address>
  </group>
```
<p class="tip">`x-address`只能在`Group`中使用</p>


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">raw-value</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 指定初始化时绑定的数据是否为文本(即省市名，而不是id)类型，即对于非id值组件内部会转换为id。如果是异步设置value，只能使用id赋值。 |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 表单标题 |
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | 表单值 |
| <span class="prop-key">list</span> | <span class="type type-array">Array</span> |  | 地址列表, 可以引入内置地址数据或者用自己的数据，但是需要按照一致的数据结构。 |
| <span class="prop-key">inline-desc</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 标题下的描述 |
| <span class="prop-key">placeholder</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 没有值时的提示文字 |
| <span class="prop-key">hideDistrict</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否隐藏区，即只显示省份和城市 |

<span class="vux-props-title">Events</span>

| name    | params   | description |
|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">on-hide</span> |   &nbsp; | 关闭后触发，当非确定时，参数为false，反之为true |
| <span class="prop-key">on-show</span> |   &nbsp; | 显示时触发 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/x-address">进入demo页面</a>
<br><br><br>

### XInput_COM
``` js
import { XInput } from 'vux'
```

```html
  <group>
    <x-input title="title" v-model="value"></x-input>
  </group>
```
<p class="tip">`x-input`只能在`Group`中使用</p>


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 表单值，使用`v-model`绑定 |
| <span class="prop-key">required</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否必值，如果不禁用验证，当没有填写时会在右侧显示错误icon |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | label文字 |
| <span class="prop-key">placeholder</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | placeholder 提示 |
| <span class="prop-key">show-clear</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | true | 是否显示清除icon |
| <span class="prop-key">min</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | 最小输入字符限制 |
| <span class="prop-key">max</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | 最大输入字符限制 |


<a class="vux-demo-link" href="#" router-link="/zh-CN/demos/x-input">进入demo页面</a>

<br><span class="vux-props-title">Changes (v2.0.0)</span>
<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  添加 `novalidate` 及 `iconType` 可以禁用组件验证，手动显示 error 或者 success 样式</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-feature">feature</span>  `is-type` 支持传入函数</span></li><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  受限于vue2不能动态设置type，目前`type`支持 text password number email</span></li></ul>

``` js
import { XNumber } from 'vux'
```

```html

  </group>
```
<p class="tip">`x-number`只能在`Group`中使用</p>


<span class="vux-props-title">Props</span>

| name   | type | default    | description   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| <span class="prop-key">value</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 表单值，使用`v-model`绑定 |
| <span class="prop-key">title</span> | <span class="type type-string">String</span> |  | 标题 |
| <span class="prop-key">min</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | 最小值 |
| <span class="prop-key">max</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> |  | 最大值 |
| <span class="prop-key">step</span> | <span class="type type-number">Number</span> | 1 | 步长 |
| <span class="prop-key">fillable</span> | <span class="type type-boolean">Boolean</span> | false | 是否可填写 |

<ul><li><span style="font-size:14px;"><span class="change change-change">change</span>  fillable 值默认为false, 稍微保护一下不小心商城的后端接口没有做好数据校验的用户，导致用户粘贴负数还提交正确</span></li></ul>
